channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kamala Harris once said police could pay surprise visits to legal gun owners' homes for safe storage checks
item.description: As San Francisco's district attorney, Kamala Harris told legal gun owners in her community that authorities could "walk into" their homes to inspect w...

item.title: Trump vows to get State and Local Tax deduction back as he heads to Long Island
item.description: Former President Donald Trump pledged to "get SALT back" as he prepares to head to Long Island, New York, for a rally.

item.title: A Welcome Blow to the NLRB
item.description: For actual unfair labor practices, there’s a wonderful thing called a federal court.

item.title: Facebook Censors Federalist Report On Springfield Goose-Hunting With Chinese-Funded ‘Fact Checker’
item.description: Meta and the Chinese-owned company ByteDance pay Lead Stories to fact check stories on their platforms.

item.title: Bipartisan House duo cracks down on gun trafficking at US-Mexico border
item.description: Reps. Abigail Spanberger and Dan Crenshaw are mounting the latest bipartisan effort to crack down on border security with a new House bill.

item.title: Additional states targeted by suspicious packages, FBI investigating more than 15 possible threats
item.description: The FBI and the U.S. Postal Inspection Service on Tuesday were investigating the origin of suspicious packages that have been sent to or received by e...

item.title: The Unconstitutionality of Kamala Harris’s Rent-Control Plan
item.description: Historically, rent control — in all its forms — has proven counterproductive.

item.title: Hillary Clinton Wants To Jail Americans For ‘Misinformation.’ Let’s Start With Her
item.description: Clinton might want to think twice before proposing prosecutions for spreading Russian propaganda. No one has done that more than she has.

item.title: John Thune is striving to be the next Republican Senate leader, but can he rise in Trump's GOP?

item.title: What’s Really Driving the Birth-Rate Crisis
item.description: Young Westerners increasingly resemble captive panda bears who have to be pushed into one another and bribed with delicacies to be persuaded to mate.

item.title: Post-Lockdowns, There’s A Teacher Burnout Crisis In America’s Schools
item.description: Districts mismanage their budgets, cutting the core personnel who actually teach classes while maintaining bloated bureaucratic overhead.

item.title: Top House committee shreds Biden-Harris admin on border crisis in new report: ‘Assault on the rule of law’

item.title: Billie Jean King will be the first individual female athlete awarded the Congressional Gold Medal
item.description: Billie Jean King will become the first individual female athlete to be awarded the Congressional Gold Medal.

item.title: Europe’s bravest patriots, &c.
item.description: On Orbán, Salvini, and Ukraine; the political drama of Springfield, Ohio; the sensational Caitlin Clark; and more.

item.title: Tim Walz’s Position On IVF Shows How Extreme He Is
item.description: Before we can have the true “freedom” that Harris and Walz envision, we must stop fooling infertile couples with false hope

item.title: Liberal group indicates they think Harris is pretending to moderate her immigration views before election
item.description: Left-wing groups are shocked by Vice President Kamala Harris' sudden bounce to the right on immigration, but some say she will revert once in office.

item.title: Let America Build Again
item.description: We cannot afford to let regulatory overreach stand in the way.
